duaList.arabic: الحمدُ للهِ الّذي كَساني هذا (الثّوب) وَرَزَقَنيه مِنْ غَـيـْرِ حَولٍ مِنّي وَلا قـوّة
duaList.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee kasanee hatha (aththawb) warazaqaneehi min ghayri hawlin minnee wala quwwah
duaList.translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power nor might from myself
